snippet: John Schwartz, a science reporter, writes about what surprised him the most while he reported on a study of the amount of plastic in our oceans.
abstract: John Schwartz, a science reporter, writes about what surprised him the most while he reported on a study of the amount of plastic in our oceans.
lead_paragraph: John Schwartz, a science reporter, recently wrote about a disturbing study about the amount of plastic in our oceans. Here he describes his response to the findings.

headline.main: Ocean Study Gives Reporter the Creeps
